text.section: Nothing in this section shall prohibit the Governor and Lieutenant Governor from agreeing upon additional duties within the executive branch of the state government to be performed by the Lieutenant Governor.

law.history: Amended 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 47, sec. 4, effective June 26, 2007. -- Amended 2003 Ky. Acts ch. 82, sec. 1, effective June 24, 2003. -- Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 486, sec. 14, effective July 15, 1994. -- Amended 1993 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 4, sec. 74, effective September 16, 1993. -- Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 105, sec. 70, effective July 14, 1992. -- Amended 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 331, sec. 7, effective July 15, 1986. -- Amended 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 111, sec. 18, effective July 13, 1984. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 447, sec. 13, effective April 12, 1982. -- Created 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 141, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1980.
